text: yārige tanna duṣṭa kelasagaḷannu candagāṇisi biḍalāgideyō avanu avugaḷannu satkāryagaḷāgiyē kāṇuttāne. Khaṇḍitavāgiyū allāhanē tānicchisidavarannu dārigeḍisuttāne mattu tāniccisidavarige saridāriyannu tōrisuttāne. Nīvu avara (dhikkārigaḷa) kuritu nondukoḷḷabēḍi. Avaru māḍuttiruva ellavannū allāhanu khaṇḍita ballanu
